h3: Types of North Carolina Personal Injury Cases
Advocates for the Injured in Smithfield
Contact an Experienced Personal Injury Attorney Today

paragraphs: Raleigh | Smithfield | Charlotte | Orlando

At our law firm, we believe that accident victims have the right to collect compensation from the party or parties responsible for their injuries. When you have been injured by the careless, negligent, or wrongful actions of another person or entity, our Wake County personal injury attorneys can help. Choosing the right attorney is an important decision, as the lawyer you select can make a difference in the outcome of your case. You need a thorough, knowledgeable, and skilled professional with the experience to get results. You need the Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC.

Our attorney injury personal team has more than 35 years of combined legal experience, and we have recovered millions of dollars in verdicts and settlements for our clients. We combine a tenacious work ethic with an unparalleled commitment to personal service to create an approach that has afforded us an impressive history of success and a reputation as a law firm that gets results. If you have been injured in any type of accident, contact us first.

Every day, hundreds of accidents of all different types occur in and around Wake County, some of which may cause catastrophic injuries. Your best lawyer for personal injury at the Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC is equipped to assist those who have been injured as the result of:

When you choose the Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC to represent you in your personal injury case, you get more than a lawyer. You get a team of hardworking legal professionals who understands what is at stake for you. We are committed to earning your trust by being open and honest with you throughout every stage of your case.

Our personal injury Attorney will start by sitting down with you to discuss the details of your situation. We will listen carefully to your version of what happened so that we know where to begin our investigation into the circumstances of your accident. In addition, we will take the time to learn about your injuries and how they are affecting your everyday life. By doing so, we can develop a clear understanding of what you will need to begin rebuilding your life. We can even help you seek the medical care you need so that you can stay focused on your physical recovery while we go to work in building your case for maximum compensation.

As our client, you become a member of our extended family, and your personal injury attorneys are never more than a phone call away, any time of the day or night. To learn more about our firm or to get started with your personal injury claim, contact us today. Call 1-844-YO-PELEO or 919-626-8450 to schedule a free consultation and case review at the Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC. Our personal injury team serves clients in and around Raleigh, Wake County, Smithfield, Johnston County, Charlotte, Mecklenburg County, and throughout central North Carolina. Hablamos Español.
by wvasquez@vasquezlawfirm.com | Mar 5, 2025 | Workers' Compensation

Motor vehicle accidents: We handle car, truck, and motorcycle accidents, as well as crashes involving drunk drivers and uninsured or underinsured motorists.
Pedestrian and bicycle accidents: Pedestrians and bicycle riders are often among the most seriously injured victims when accidents occur.
Mass transit accidents: Our lawyers assist those injured while riding buses and other forms of public transportation in Raleigh and Charlotte.
Emergency vehicle accidents: When you are injured in a crash involving an ambulance, firetruck, or another emergency response vehicle, collecting damages can be very complicated.
Boating and watercraft accidents: Accidents on the water can cause severe injuries, and our team is equipped to help you seek compensation from a personal injury lawyer.
Premises liability accidents: Slip-and-fall and trip-and-fall accidents are common on both private and commercial property, including retail spaces and shopping centers.

paragraphs: At our law firm, we believe that accident victims have the right to collect compensation from the party or parties responsible for their injuries. When you have been injured by the careless, negligent, or wrongful actions of another person or entity, our Wake County personal injury attorneys can help. Choosing the right attorney is an important decision, as the lawyer you select can make a difference in the outcome of your case. You need a thorough, knowledgeable, and skilled professional with the experience to get results. You need the Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC.

Our attorney injury personal team has more than 35 years of combined legal experience, and we have recovered millions of dollars in verdicts and settlements for our clients. We combine a tenacious work ethic with an unparalleled commitment to personal service to create an approach that has afforded us an impressive history of success and a reputation as a law firm that gets results. If you have been injured in any type of accident, contact us first.

Every day, hundreds of accidents of all different types occur in and around Wake County, some of which may cause catastrophic injuries. Your best lawyer for personal injury at the Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC is equipped to assist those who have been injured as the result of:

When you choose the Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC to represent you in your personal injury case, you get more than a lawyer. You get a team of hardworking legal professionals who understands what is at stake for you. We are committed to earning your trust by being open and honest with you throughout every stage of your case.

Our personal injury Attorney will start by sitting down with you to discuss the details of your situation. We will listen carefully to your version of what happened so that we know where to begin our investigation into the circumstances of your accident. In addition, we will take the time to learn about your injuries and how they are affecting your everyday life. By doing so, we can develop a clear understanding of what you will need to begin rebuilding your life. We can even help you seek the medical care you need so that you can stay focused on your physical recovery while we go to work in building your case for maximum compensation.

As our client, you become a member of our extended family, and your personal injury attorneys are never more than a phone call away, any time of the day or night. To learn more about our firm or to get started with your personal injury claim, contact us today. Call 1-844-YO-PELEO or 919-626-8450 to schedule a free consultation and case review at the Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC. Our personal injury team serves clients in and around Raleigh, Wake County, Smithfield, Johnston County, Charlotte, Mecklenburg County, and throughout central North Carolina. Hablamos Español.
by wvasquez@vasquezlawfirm.com | Mar 5, 2025 | Workers' Compensation
by wvasquez@vasquezlawfirm.com | Feb 7, 2025 | Uncategorized
by wvasquez@vasquezlawfirm.com | Feb 6, 2025 | Immigration
